item.title: Master Archivist (Level 8)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 7)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Messenger (Level 6)
item.description: Applied a patch using git am.

item.title: Master Seamstress (Level 7)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Hunter (Level 6)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Master Butcher (Level 8)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Master Fisherman (Level 10)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Pilgrim (Level 6)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: News Reader (Level 4)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Investigator (Level 4)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 4)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 3)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 5)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 4)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 3)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 1)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 10)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Author (Level 9)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Collector (Level 6)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch
